tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Got reference of Dr Bharat for my wife's ligament tier in right hand wrist. was very happy with the treatment which eventually had to be done through surgery at Manipal hospital HAL road which turns out to be a major surgery. post surgery and physiotherapy which lasted for 3 months the results were good and she was able to almost do all things as before. so very happy and thankful to the doctor for helping us with this complicated treatment and surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Actually wife was suffering from Tennis Elbow. After prescribing medicine there is some improvement. Thanks to Doctor
He said that i have to take medicines for 10 days and physiotherapy for 2 weeks continued with physio exercises.

Doctor did not give much time  , I felt as if I am being admitted for surgery in hurry, simple thing if splint is put for long time (a month/40 days) obviously wrist will get stiffened, Dr was scaring me as if stiffened wrist is a big issue . ** ** *** **** ** ******* ***** ** ******** **** *** ******* ** ********* *** *** *** **** ********** ****** **** ***** ***** *** *** *** **** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Extremely happy with Dr. Bharath Kadadi, listens to his patients and with his great experience prescribes the right medecines and tests ensuring his patients recover.I definitely recommend Dr. Bharath Kadadi, specialists with emense experience, ********* *** *** **** ********** ******* He will be our family orthopedic doctor always.
